verses.content: Chun, LALPA chun Mosie chu a biek a,
“Tukhawma thil suksuolin, LALPA thu bawse ta sienla; sum inkawltir thu amanih, hlêp thu amanih, inrûk thu amaniha tuol- bâwmhai hlêmin, mâni tuolbâwmhai lo nêksâwr ta sienla,
annawleh, thil inhmang hmuin, chu thua chun khêl hrilin ṭawng inkhâm ta sienla, hieng thil po po a ieng ieng khawm hi a suksuol a,
a thil suksuol leia thiemnaw a chang chun, a înrûk dâm, hlêma a thil lâk dâm, a kuoma sum inkawltira um dâm, thil inhmang a hmu dâm,

khêla ṭawng a înkhâmna thil ieng khawm chu a thung nâwk ding a nih; a kim charin thung nâwk vawng a ta, a hmun ngaa ṭheha hmun khat chu a chuongin bel a tih; bâwsiet inthâwina ân hlân ni chun a neitu chu a pêk nâwk ding a nih.
A bawsiet inthâwina dingin, berâm ruol laia mi, i ngaia bawsiet inthâwina dinga âwmtâwk, berâm- chal demkailo LALPA ta dingin thiempu kuomah a hung kei ding a nih;
chun, thiempu chun LALPA hmaah intlanna siempêk a ta, ngai- dam nîng a tih, thiemnaw changna dinga thil a thaw taphawthai chung- chânga chun,” tiin.
LALPA chun Mosie a biek a,

“Aron le a naupasalhai chu thu pe rawh. Hi hi pumrawhmang thilin- hlân dân ding chu a nih. Pum- rawhmang thilinhlân chu mâichâm a chunga a rawnaa chun zânkhawvârin a zingkâr chen um a ta; chun, mâi- châm mei chu a hring zing ding a nih.

Thiempu chun a puon zai inhmi silfên inbel a ta, a tisa inkhumna dingin a puon zai inhmi kekawr chu bun a ta; chun, mâichâma pumraw- hmang thilinhlân kâng vâmhai chu lâng a ta, mâichâm sîra chun a sie ding a nih.
Chun, a silfên chu hlîp a ta, silfên dang inbel a ta, a vâmhai chu khawhnâwm tieng hmun faiah a fepui ding a nih.

Mâichâm chunga mei chu sukhring zing nîng a ta, a thi ding a ni nawh; chun, thiempu chun tûk tinin thing chu tîng a ta, pumrawhmang thilinhlân chu sie fel a ta, chutaka chun inremna thilinhlân thâuhai chu a raw ding a nih.
Mâichâma chun mei chu hring zing a ta, a thi ding a ni nawh.
“Chun, hi hi fâkmi thilinhlân dân chu a nih: Aron naupasalhai chun mâichâm bulah LALPA hmaah an inhlân ding a nih.

Ama chun fâkmi thilinhlâna mi beiphit inditak vei khat le, chu fâkmi thilinhlân chunga hriek le beraw po po la suok a ta, LALPA ta dinga rim inhniktak, hriet zingna dingin mâi- châma chun a raw ding a nih.
Chun, lâk mahla chu Aron le a naupasalhai chun an fâk ding a nih; chu chu hmun inthienga chun chawl ṭhang loin fâng an ta; intuokna puon in tuolah an fâk ding a nih.
Chawl ṭhanga em ding a ni nawh. Mei hmanga ka thilinhlân an chanvo dinga ka thilpêk a nih; chu chu suol inthâwina le bawsiet in- thâwina ang bawkin thil inthiengtak a nih.

Aron thla pasal po pohai chun an fâk ding a nih. Chu chu LALPA ta dinga pumrawhmang thilinhlân chungchânga in thlahai chena kum- khawtluong dân nîng a ta; chu chu tâwk taphawt chu inthieng pei an tih,” tiin.
Chun, LALPA chun Mosie a biek a,

“Hriek nâla an um nia Aron le a naupasalhaiin LALPA kuoma an inhlân ding thilinhlân chu hi hi a nih: fâkmi thilinhlân ding, beiphit inditak epha hmun sâwma ṭheha hmun khata mi, a zâtve zîngkâr, a zâtve zântieng.
A zêuna thlêngdârah hriek pawla siem ding a nih. Ân chie pawl pha chun hung la lût i ta, a her te tein fâkmi thilinhlân chu LALPA ta dinga rim inhnik dingin în hlân ding a nih.
A naupasalhai laia mi a hnung thuoltu dinga hriek nâla um thiempu chun, kumkhaw dân dinga pêk a ni angin LALPA kuomah inhlân a ta; a rêng el chun rawhmang ding a nih.
Thiempuin fâkmi thilinhlân ân hlân taphawt chu rawhmang vawng ding a na: fâk der lo ding a nih,” tiin.
LALPA chun Mosie a biek a,

“Aron le a naupasalhai kuoma chun hril la: Hi hi suol inthâwina dân ding chu a nih. Pumrawhmang thilinhlân thatna hmuna chun suol inthâwina khawm chu LALPA hmaa that ding a nih. Chu chu thil inthieng tak a nih.
Suol inthâwina inhlântu thiem- pu chun fâng a ta; intuokna puon in tuolah, hmun inthiengah a fâk ding a nih.
Thil iengkhawm chu sa chu tâwk taphawt chu thil inthieng sie hran nîng a ta; chun, a thisen chu ieng puona khawm the kai a ni chun, a kaina taphawt chu hmun inthienga chun i sâwp ding a nih.
A suongna pil bêl chu sukkawi ding a na; dâr bêla suong a ni ruok chun nâwt faia intlêu fai ding a nih.
Thiempu sûngkuoa pasal ta- phawt chun chu chu an fâk ding a nih. Chu chu ân thieng tak a nih.
Suol inthâwina, a thisen, hmun inthienga intlanna siemna dinga in- tuokna puon ina hung lâk ruok chu fâk ding a ni nawh a; raw el ding a nih.
